I am very happy to inform you officially that the Board of Directors of HAEB
has approved your application for associate membership in our association.
You will now be receiving regularly from us the monthly HAEB News-Letter,
additional publications of interest, and many other things. You should, of
course, feel free to write to this office at any time for any information
concerning educational broadcasting.
Under separate cover, we are sending you a copy of the HAEB Radio-Television
Bibliography. which is issued to all MSB members. We trust you will find It
useful*
